game.name: KNOCKOFF
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: KNOCKOFF is a first of its kind Isometric Fighting Game and (tasteful) horror RPG made by 1 person over the course of 4 years in between work and school and the like! Features a blend of bullet hell mechanics and fighting game combat, this wack Mall Brawler is like nothing you've ever seen~!
game.shortDescriptionEn: KNOCKOFF is a first of its kind Isometric Fighting Game and (tasteful) horror RPG made by 1 person over the course of 4 years in between work and school and the like! Features a blend of bullet hell mechanics and fighting game combat, this wack Mall Brawler is like nothing you've ever seen~!
